# Interface: ITreasury

Treasury.

## Table of contents

### Properties

- [milestoneId](ITreasury.md#milestoneid)
- [amount](ITreasury.md#amount)

## Properties

### milestoneId

• **milestoneId**: `string`

The milestone hash of the treasury.

---

### amount

• **amount**: `string`

The amount for the treasury.
